org.apache.kafka.streams.kstream

Interface ValueJoiner<V1,V2,R>

  • Type Parameters:
    V1 - first value type
    V2 - second value type
    R - joined value type

    public interface ValueJoiner<V1,V2,R>
    The ValueJoiner interface for joining two values into a new value.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      R apply(V1 value1, V2 value2)
      Return a joined value consisting of value1 and value2.

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        R apply(V1 value1,
      V2 value2)
        Return a joined value consisting of value1 and value2.
        Parameters:
        value1 - the first value for joining
        value2 - the second value for joining
        Returns:
        the joined value
